MacroOp.Name: OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG_LINE
MacroOp.Brief: Displays the line number as part of the debug output.
MacroOp.Description: When specified, all debug output will include the line number of where the debug output originated.
MacroOp.Notes: OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG must be specified for this flag to work.
MacroOp.Synopsis: #define OMNI_SHOW_DEBUG_LINE Signifies to format the debug output to display the line number in front of the output.
